text: Janakkala is a municipality in Finland. 16,881 people lived there in 2013. Population centers: Turenki, Tervakoski, Leppäkoski and a village called Tarinmaa. Neighbour municipalities, in south: Hausjärvi, Loppi and Riihimäki. Hämeenlinna is on the north. It was founded in 1866. ==Coat of arms== Janakkalas coat of arms has been designed by Onni Oja in 1950. ==Villages== 26 villages: * Harviala * Heinäjoki * Hiisi * Hyvikkälä * Jokimaa * Kerkkola * Kernaala * Kiipula * Kiri (kylä) * Koljala * Leppäkoski * Löyttymäki * Mallinkainen * Melkkola * Napiala * Punkka * Rehakka * Saloinen * Sauvala * Tarinmaa * Tanttala * Tervakoski * Turenki * Uhkoila * Virala * Vähikkälä ==Known people== * Tuomas Kyrö, writer * Ida Aalberg, actor * Olavi Borg, professor * Laiska Leppone, rap-musician * Reko Lundán, writer * Timo Mäenpää, musician * Kustaa Paturi, poetry and agonist * A. P. Sarjanto, songwriter == Other websites == * The official Janakkala page Category:1866 establishments in Finland Category:Municipalities of Kanta-Häme
title: Janakkala
